author: WCVB
title: Man faces felony charges after Chelsea explosive device incident | Flipboard
text:
Man faces felony charges after Chelsea explosive device incident
Douglas MacMillan of Dorchester faces felony charges after allegedly detonating an explosive near Chelsea apartments. He pleaded not guilty and awaits a hearing.
